full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement

### Project Title
CP Topaz Cables/Filters/Splitters

### Reference Number
cb-7684-50400859

### Amendments
This amendment (1) has been made to the original tender notice.

### Solicitation Number
W8486-238996/A

### Publication Date
2023-07-31

### Tender Closing Date and Time
2023-08-14 14:00:00 (Mountain Daylight Time)

### Amendment Date
2023-08-14

### Expected Contract Start and End Dates
2023-08-30 to 2023-10-31

### Tender Status
Expired

### Requested Items
The Department of National Defence requires the following items:

* 110 x 12BPX-69/A78-N or F-5101/T BAND PASS FILTERS, to be delivered to 7 CF Supply Depot by October 31st, 2023.
* 110 x 5HPX-A115-N or F-5103/T BAND PASS FILTERS, to be delivered to 7 CF Supply Depot by October 31st, 2023.
* 120 x 567217 SPECIAL PURPOSE ELECTRICAL CABLE ASSEMBLIES, to be delivered to 7 CF Supply Depot by October 31st, 2023.
* 140 x RA250/1141/1 HANDSETS, to be delivered to 7 CF Supply Depot by October 31st, 2023.
* 70 x 987-5015-001 SPECIAL RADIO FREQUENCY CABLE ASSEMBLIES, to be delivered to 7 CF Supply Depot by October 31st, 2023.
* 1,250 x MS12-TF POWER/RADIO FREQUENCY DIVIDERS, to be delivered to 7 CF Supply Depot by October 31st, 2023.

### Submissions and Evaluation
Bidders must submit their proposals in either official language of Canada. The proposals will be evaluated based on the lowest price offered.

### Important Notes
* The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
* Suppliers must indicate the brand name and model, or Part Number, and the NCAGE they are offering, for equivalent or substitute products.

### Contractor and Contact Information
Contractor: Department of National Defence
Contractor Address: 101 Colonel By Dr., Ottawa, ON K1A0K
